jobDescription: Who We AreRock Connections is a growing strategic marketing company that helps clients increase their revenue from advertising dollars that they've already spent. Rock Connections primarily focuses on outbound contact center solutions, providing clients with everything from customer contact to call transfers to the full sale of goods, services and products. We're a proud sister company of Quicken Loans, America's #1 online mortgage lender, who has been rated one of FORTUNE Magazine's "Best Companies to Work For" for the past 10 years.What You'll Do/NeedWhen customers have questions or suggestions about a company's service or product, they turn to Customer Service Representatives – what we call Resolution Specialists – for answers. Resolution Specialists provide specific information regarding the services, products or materials offered by a company. They answer phones, provide troubleshooting information, report and analyze customers' information and needs, issue billing details and open and close customer accounts. In summary, they are the direct link between a company and its existing and potential customers!  Qualified candidates for this position must have an appetite for excellence, as well as the ability to readily build relationships over the phone. Additionally, qualified candidates must be quality-focused, effective team players who are motivated to achieve a rewarding career within the organization. More than any other place you'll work, we're dedicated to honing your skills, helping you grow and making sure you have plenty of fun while you're at it.
